Cherrycake\Item::loadFromStringFieldGetDatabaseRow

loadFromStringFieldGetDatabaseRow

Returns a DatabaseRow object containing the query result of the Item with the given string field

    Signature

    public function loadFromStringFieldGetDatabaseRow(string $stringField )

    Parameters

    $stringField — string
    The string field value of the Item to load from the Database

    Returns

    DatabaseRow
    A DatabaseRow object containing the result of querying the item with the given id, or false if error
